attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2002-1992

Date: 2002-11-21

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que Andromahi Karakatsanis, de la ville de Toronto dans la province de l'Ontario, une avocate, soit nommée juge de la Cour supérieure de justice, et juge d'office de la Cour d'appel de l'Ontario, à compter du 27 décembre 2002.



The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Andromahi Karakatsanis, of the City of Toronto in the Province of Ontario,

Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario, effective December 27, 2002.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Andromahi Karakatsanis, of the City of Toronto in the Province of Ontario,   Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario, effective December 27, 2002.
